title: Ranked Q randomly down?
body: Ranked Q went down at 10:25 AM 16/07/15. I cannot find out why anywhere (Maybe I was looking in the wrong places) and I have no idea when it will be back or how to find out beforehand if this happens again. Any help/knowledge would be appreciated. Thank you.

replies.body:
Hi,

We've temporarily disabled ranked because we have found an issue that was affecting ranked games negatively.  There's not much more information about the issue that we can give at this point, but as soon as there is we will be sure to update everyone.

Cheers
Mindstar

We've just put up an [announcement post](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/7eKz7fzV-ranked-queue-disabled-160715) here that we are going to keep up to date.

Cheers
Mindstar
